title: if you gift somebody DJ sona do they still get the icon and banner?
body: how does gifting work with ultimate skins

replies.body:
Hey Veraska! 

If you gift DJ Sona, the person receiving the skin should receive the icons, since it's part of the skin package! :]

KateyKhaos,

I was gifted the DJ Sona skin, but received no summoner icons to go with it. (It was a mystery gift)

Ut oh. D: 

We're currently investigating what went wrong there, since you're supposed obtain the skin, the icons and the banners. 

Player Support will be able to take a look at your account and grant you the icons. You can fill out a ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584).
ayyyyeeeee she gon love it. ty!! (bn_n)b
I also was gifted but i did not get the icon.
